1351112.content:
Candace was talking to Stacy on her phone when she noticed her brothers building something outside. "Hold on, Stacy. I've got some busting to do." She went outside and saw Phineas and Ferb working on what appeared to be a toy gun.

"Phineas! Ferb! What are you two doing?" She asked them.

"Oh, hey Candace!" Phineas replied. "Ferb and I were just working on our new growth ray!"

"Growth ray?" Candace was clearly worried, remembering the time she grew to 50 feet tall. "Oh no, I've had a bad experience with growth before! This thing had better not mess up!"

"Don't worry, Candace. I'm sure it won't." However, just as he said that, the growth ray misfired and hit Candace.

"Oh no, not again!" Candace started to grow, and grow, and GROW! She looked down as everything around her appeared to get smaller and smaller. "How big am I going to get this time?" She asked as she was already going past 50 feet. It wasn't long before she stopped growing for now at-
1351112.title: The boys invent something
